topic.title: How to insert/get a local html page using the zeroframe api?
topic.body:
Hi there!
How can I use fileGet to load a local html page using coffee script?

There's an example on the api documentation but it's for a json file: http://zeronet.readthedocs.org/en/latest/site_development/zeroframe_api_reference/#fileget-inner_path-required

I need a simple example from where to start. Thanx!
